data.name: LaundryWell
data.title: Full Stack Developer Internship

Worked on the React rewrite exclusively utilizing Next.js, TailwindCSS and React Query
Built order delivery system for drivers to manage pickups and deliveries

data.name: Gigturbo
data.title: Software Engineer Co-op
points: Lead frontend engineer behind beta site rewrite. Initial app built on Angular, then rewritten in React (Next.js)
Expanding features, managing and developing a growing community of users while focusing on usability testing and documentation of product use
Leveraging machine learning capabilities and 3rd party API's to enhance behavioral and audience targeting capabilities for the platform
